Vamprah::

Should she tell him that information or not?

Darkfate is a Predacon commander specialist in undercover missions, 
his name is an allias... a code name... I don't know more than him 
over that... I just have heard some rumour about him.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer frowns, ignoring Vamprah's first request, and only 
> answering her last question. "Well, for one, who in the pit's 
> Darkfate, and what was that necklace on you doin'?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > ::Vamprah::
> > 
> > She must be insane to answered him, but her voice came from 
> > darkness...
> > 
> > "Give me a good reason to belive you!!!!" she said in a camly but 
> > challening tone "I've heard something like you're told me before 
> and 
> > I fell in bigger tramp... What questions anyway...???"
